Text:
Thanks ! Downloads & Installs flawlessly - it's really an awesome program. 

One Point though to all downloaders - As per instructions, you should first install the program and then the content pack. But, do start and close the program at least once, before installing the Content Pack or it will not install, because it does not recognise the installation till the program is started and closed at least once.
 I am writing this because I faced the same problem.
@promodsharma Thanks, I had completely forgotten about that step. Install it......Copy crack over...Run the software once and close it....Run content pack installer
ChocShake, Thank you sooooooooo much! Crack works just fine. Just superb job, tremendously appreciated! Xara is the best graphic program on Earth!!!
